changelog:
====================
  !NOTE!NOTE!NOTE!
====================
YOU CAN'T DIRTY FLASH THIS BUILD! CLEAN FLASH IS NECESSARY!
You can't flash older builds after flashing this or newer ones either
And obviously you dirty can't flash (over) other ROMs, hope it's clear now
Since this build my builds are signed with release keys
You can find info why it's good in Google
